Hello! I'm Miguel Delgado, a software engineering student at UPC-FIB. I'm a designing enthusiast and a full-stack developer wannabe. I think of myself as a great learner and a good teamworker, also considering myself as a good troubleshooter and a responsible person.

Apart from that, I'm an outdoor sports lover and avid chess player. Also I'm part of the organizing team of HackUPC, mainly taking part in Logistics department.
